description: Generate a histogram of the fragment length distributions of the input libraries.

-in.description: The list of input BAM files.

-dir.description: Path of the output directory.  This must be empty or non-existent.

-cf.description: Threshold for determining consistency with the fragment length distribution [0.01]

-tr.description: Trim rate for the fragment length distribution [0.02]

-mq.description: Minimum mapping quality for a normal read pair

-mf.description: The minimum number of normal fragments in a library [10000].

default.description: Default instance requires the users input for all files.
